Text: Sorry forgot to say this is the collector book showing all the models and not the codex which contsains the rules and is already on the site

Thanks, great quality!  Hey Cadia if you have the paper copy of the 2000 edition of this collectors guide could you scan it and upload it for others to enjoy? Please!  This one only covers models released from 1992, no first edition stuff.
